question:
Which among the following pairs of volcanoes is/are correctly matched?
  1. Mount Kilimanjaro - AfricaÂ 
  2. Pico de Orizaba - South America
  3. Mount Damavand - Europe
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Mount Kilimanjaro is a dormant volcano in Tanzania. It is the highest volcano in Africa. It is the highest single free-standing mountain in the world with an elevation of 5,895 metres.

Pico de Orizaba is a stratovolcano which is currently dormant but not extinct. It is the highest volcano in North America. It is the second most prominent volcanic peak in the world after Africa's Mount Kilimanjaro.

Mount Damavand is a stratovolcano and the highest peak in Iran. It is the highest volcano in Asia with an elevation of 5609 metres. It is part of the Volcanic Seven Summits mountaineering challenge.
